Psalms__132.1: Behold how good and how pleasant it is for brethren to dwell in unity.
Psalms__132.2: Like the precious ointment on the head, that ran down upon the beard, the beard of Aaron, Which ran down to the skirt of his garment:
Psalms__132.3: As the dew of Hermon, which descendeth upon mount Sion. For there the Lord hath commandeth blessing, and life for evermore.
